title: Tibetian / Nepalese Style Font
content:
hello everyone,

does anyone have a suggestion for a Tibetan-esque / Nepalese-style font?

I'm looking for a Western font, which merely mimics the style...

Greetings,  
s
author: saman

comments.content:
[http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=tibetan](http://web.archive.org/web/20150218043024/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=tibetan "http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=tibetan") \_  
But they're both quite "juvenile" and rough - they don't at all do  
justice to Tibetan, which to me is a supernaturally beautiful script.

Ogilvy can afford to commission something better, eh? :-)

hhp
